EG Live games prize list

7
Ordim
Saturday, October 14th, 2017, 9:54:01 PM

Story telling prize list ~ Congratulations Winners ~ First place will have the first choice from the prize list, second place will have second choice, and third place will have third choice. Once a prize has been chosen by the first place, it will not be available for the second or third place winners, and so on.

Prize Choices:

Signature Verb Custom Swear Custom Spell Prep (Single circle) EZscript (For an unscripted item) Custom Log Phrase Whisper Mask Caligos Isle Games Only Spell Prep Epic Deepening (Shoulder or back worn to 160lbs) Consolation Cloak

Ordim
Sunday, October 15th, 2017, 3:13:08 PM

Sing me an Epitath ~ Congratulations Winners ~ First place will have the first choice from the prize list, second place will have second choice, and third place will have third choice. Once a prize has been chosen by the first place, it will not be available for the second or third place winners, and so on.

Prize Choices:

Signature Verb Custom Swear Custom Spell Prep (Single circle) EZscript (For an unscripted item) Custom Log Phrase Whisper Mask Caligos Isle Games Only Spell Prep Consolation Cloak Realm Flares (item cannot exceed 7x (+35) or a combined 150 service points of weighting)

Eelsa says, "Others would see: Eelsa brings her arms inward, forming her thumbs and fingers into the shape of a circle, and a silvery mist winds upward from her feet to enshroud her as she prepares a spell..."

Eelsa says, "Others would see: Amid a series of arcane gestures, Eelsa's eyes flash from blue-black to bright indigo, and the sound of surf crashing into shores reaches your ears..."

Costume Contest

In the Common language, it reads:

~ Congratulations Winners ~

First place will have the first choice from the prize list, second place will have second choice, and third place will have third choice. Once a prize has been chosen by the first place, it will not be available for the second or third place winners, and so on.

Prize Choices:

Signature Verb Custom Swear Custom Spell Prep (Single circle) EZscript (For an unscripted item) Custom Log Phrase Whisper Mask Caligos Isle Games Only Spell Prep Epic Deepening (Shoulder or back worn to 160lbs) Consolation Cloak

Ordim
Monday, October 16th, 2017, 9:45:51 PM

Pick your poison

~ Congratulations Winners ~

First place will have the first choice from the prize list, second place will have second choice, and third place will have third choice. Once a prize has been chosen by the first place, it will not be available for the second or third place winners, and so on.

Prize Choices:

Signature Verb Custom Swear Custom Spell Prep (Single circle) EZscript (For an unscripted item) Custom Log Phrase Whisper Mask Caligos Isle Games Only Spell Prep Consolation Cloak Realm Flares (item cannot exceed 7x (+35) or a combined 150 service points of weighting)
